title: How to get a fake tracking number - Quora

response.answer_text: I am also looking for fake tracking numbers. Ideally a few for each stage of the tracking process for USPS, UPS, and Fedex. No, before you all ask… I am not planning to commit a felony and if I were I wouldn’t post it to the internet first just for a bucket of I told ya so responses. I am asking because I am working on a development project that has a shipping component and I would like to validate the 3rd party shipping integration is working correctly to fetch the correct status for the right tracking number. Being able to quickly and accurately produce this test condition to make sure the resulting page layout is formatted correctly would be extremely helpful. If anyone has any idea on where to find these, please share. Otherwise, we’ll have to use tracking numbers for personally purchased shipments.

Sounds like you’re planning a fraud. Well, if you want a tracking number, to use at the post office, why not ask the post office? The post office staff can answer any question related to post office matters. I’m sure they’d be happy to tell you what to do if you go into your local post office and ask “Hi, could you tell me how to get a fake tracking number?” Or, check for the phone number of the nearest FBI office. The post office has it’s own enforcement division to arrest people for mail fraud, but the FBI would have more branches. I’m sure the FBI could give you answers about fake tracking numbers if the post office clerks can’t.
